titleStmt.title: A form of prayer with thanksgiving to be used yearly on the fifth day of November for the happy deliverance of King James I and the three estates of the realm from the most traiterous and bloody intended massacre by gun-powder : and also for the happy arrival of His present Majesty on this day for the deliverance of our church and nation / by Their Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Church of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill and Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
